title: AI Synthetic Data Generator v2.5
description: Generate unlimited synthetic data with ONNX-powered semantic embeddings (all-MiniLM-L6-v2, bge-small). 21 actor integrations (Reddit, Yelp, TripAdvisor, Zillow, Booking.com + more). 12 use-case templates. TRM/SONA self-learning. MCP server support.

mode.title: Mode
mode.description: Operation mode: generate synthetic data or integrate with other Apify actors
enumTitles: Generate - Create synthetic data from scratch
Integrate - Transform data from other Apify actors
Template - Use pre-built use case templates
mode.sectionDescription: Choose how to generate or transform data

dataType.title: Website/API Type
dataType.description: What type of website or API do you want to simulate?
enumTitles: E-Commerce - Amazon, eBay, Shopify style product listings
Social Media - Twitter, Instagram, TikTok style posts
API Response - REST API mock responses with pagination
Search Results - Google, Bing style search results
Real Estate - Zillow, Realtor style property listings
Job Boards - LinkedIn, Indeed style job listings
News Sites - News articles with engagement metrics
Stock Trading - OHLCV, quotes, orders, market data (Bloomberg-style)
Medical/Healthcare - Patient records, diagnoses, billing, vitals
Company/Corporate - Org structure, financials, workforce, leadership
Supply Chain - Shipments, inventory, logistics, suppliers
Financial Services - Transactions, accounts, fraud detection
Bloomberg Terminal - Full market data, fundamentals, analytics, news
Custom Schema - Define your own data structure
Time-Series - Stock prices, IoT sensors, metrics
Web Events - Page views, clicks, form submissions
Embeddings - Vector data for ML/RAG testing
Demo - Try all types with sample data

count.title: Number of Records
count.description: How many records to generate (1-10,000). Start small to test, then scale up.

integrateActorId.title: Apify Actor to Integrate
integrateActorId.description: Actor ID to pull data from. 21 actors supported. Used in 'integrate' mode.
enumTitles: Google Maps Scraper - Local business data
Google Search Scraper - Search results
Instagram Scraper - Posts, reels, stories
TikTok Scraper - Videos, engagement
YouTube Scraper - Videos, channels
Twitter/X Scraper - Tweets, profiles
Amazon Scraper - Product listings
Shopify Scraper - Store products
Web Scraper - General web pages
Website Content Crawler - Full site content
Cheerio Scraper - Structured extraction
News Scraper - News articles
LinkedIn Scraper - Jobs, profiles
TripAdvisor Scraper - Reviews, restaurants, hotels
Yelp Scraper - Business reviews, ratings
Booking.com Scraper - Hotels, accommodations
Zillow Scraper - Real estate listings
Craigslist Scraper - Classifieds, listings
Reddit Scraper - Posts, comments, subreddits
Facebook Posts Scraper - Posts, engagement
Google Places API - Places, reviews
integrateActorId.sectionDescription: One-click integration with 21 top Apify actors for RAG/memory use cases

integrateRunId.title: Run ID
integrateRunId.description: Specific run ID to pull data from, or 'latest' for most recent run

integrateDatasetId.title: Dataset ID (Alternative)
integrateDatasetId.description: Direct dataset ID to pull data from (alternative to Run ID)

memorizeFields.title: Fields to Memorize
memorizeFields.description: Which fields to extract for RAG/memory. Leave empty for defaults.

useTemplate.title: Use Case Template
useTemplate.description: Pre-built template for common use cases. 12 templates available. Used in 'template' mode.
enumTitles: Lead Intelligence - Sales teams memorizing prospect data
Competitor Monitor - Track competitor mentions/changes
Support Knowledge - Customer support RAG system
Research Assistant - Academic/market research
Content Library - Content creators' reference
Product Catalog - E-commerce product memory
Review Aggregator - Aggregate reviews from multiple platforms
Price Tracker - Monitor prices for competitive intelligence
Social Listening - Monitor social conversations and trends
Talent Sourcing - Recruit candidates from job platforms
Real Estate Intel - Property market analysis
Travel Planner - Hotels, restaurants, activities data
useTemplate.sectionDescription: Pre-configured templates for common data workflows

schema.title: Custom Data Schema
schema.description: Define your own data structure for 'structured' type. Example: {"url": "string (url)", "title": "string", "price": "number (10-500)"}

apiEndpoint.title: API Endpoint (for API Response)
apiEndpoint.description: Base endpoint path for API simulation. Example: /api/products

eventTypes.title: Event Types (for Web Events)
eventTypes.description: Types of web events to generate

timeSeriesConfig.title: Time-Series Configuration
timeSeriesConfig.description: Settings for time-series data (prices, metrics, etc.)

generateEmbeddings.title: Generate Embeddings
generateEmbeddings.description: Generate vector embeddings for all output records (useful for RAG systems)
generateEmbeddings.sectionDescription: Semantic embeddings powered by ONNX Runtime (Hugging Face Transformers.js)

useOnnxEmbeddings.title: Use ONNX Semantic Embeddings
useOnnxEmbeddings.description: Use real semantic embeddings via ONNX (slower but more accurate) vs random vectors (fast for testing)

embeddingModel.title: ONNX Embedding Model
embeddingModel.description: Choose embedding model. Smaller models are faster, larger models are more accurate.
enumTitles: all-MiniLM-L6-v2 (384d, Fast, Good) - Recommended
bge-small-en-v1.5 (384d, Fast, Excellent)
all-mpnet-base-v2 (768d, Medium, Excellent)
e5-small-v2 (384d, Fast, Very Good)
gte-small (384d, Fast, Very Good)

simulationMode.title: Long-Running Simulation
simulationMode.description: Enable simulation mode for testing scrapers that poll for updates. Data is pushed in batches with delays.

batchSize.title: Batch Size (Simulation)
batchSize.description: Number of records per batch in simulation mode

delayBetweenBatches.title: Delay Between Batches (ms)
delayBetweenBatches.description: Milliseconds to wait between batches in simulation mode. Use 1000 for 1 second delays.

seed.title: Random Seed
seed.description: Set a seed for reproducible results. Same seed = same data every time.

outputFormat.title: Output Format
enumTitles: JSON - Standard JSON format
JSONL - JSON Lines (one record per line)
CSV - Comma-separated values
outputFormat.sectionDescription: Control how data is formatted and delivered

webhookUrl.title: Webhook URL
webhookUrl.description: URL to POST results to when generation completes (for async workflows)

provider.title: AI Provider (Optional)
provider.description: AI model for enhanced generation. Works great without it too!
enumTitles: Gemini - Free tier available, fast generation
OpenRouter - Access GPT-4, Claude, Llama, and 100+ models

apiKey.title: API Key (Optional)
apiKey.description: Your API key. Gemini: https://makersuite.google.com/app/apikey | OpenRouter: https://openrouter.ai/keys

model.title: Model
model.description: Model to use. Gemini models for Gemini provider, others for OpenRouter.

quality.title: Data Quality
quality.description: Quality level (0.1-1.0). Higher = more realistic but uses more AI tokens.

sonaEnabled.title: Enable SONA Learning
sonaEnabled.description: Enable TRM/SONA self-learning for intelligent pattern recognition in data generation. Learns from generation patterns to improve data quality.
sonaEnabled.sectionDescription: Self-Optimizing Neural Architecture with Tiny Recursive Models (7M params, 83% GSM8K)

ewcLambda.title: EWC Lambda
ewcLambda.description: Elastic Weight Consolidation strength for pattern preservation. Higher values maintain more learned patterns across generations.

patternThreshold.title: Pattern Threshold
patternThreshold.description: Minimum confidence threshold for pattern recognition in data generation (0-1)

sonaLearningTiers.title: Learning Tiers
sonaLearningTiers.description: SONA learning tiers: instant (real-time), background (async optimization), deep (comprehensive analysis)
